replies.body:
Heeya Bloodoh,
I'm sorry that the lottery ticket thing didn't work, but this is not the place to report bugs.
Please report bugs at Avicus Issue Tracker located on Github: https://github.com/Avicus/Issues/issues
I'm sure the developers will look into it.

I'll let the thread stay open incase you or other players have questions regarding this issue.
Have a nize day!

Regards Flo/resepignev
